data.eml:eml: New genera and new species of earthworms (Oligochaeta: Octochaetidae) from Western Ghats, South India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Julka, J. M., Blanchart, Eric, Chapuis-Lardy, Lydie (2004): New genera and new species of earthworms (Oligochaeta: Octochaetidae) from Western Ghats, South India. Zootaxa 486: 1-27, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157661
